title: Muse Volume 1
description: "Muse Volume 1" is a literature magazine composed of poetry (Free Verse, SLAM, and Spoken Word), short stories (Fiction and Non-Fiction), art, and photography. The different themes that this literature magazine consist of are, loss, finding love in many forms, humor, inner-beauty, empowerment, and the struggles of dealing with body image and stigma.
author: Michelle Goff
